content: from * to end round 64 *ssk k1 k2tog p1 repeat from * to end round 65 *k2tog ssk repeat from * to end © jessica correa 2011 for personal use only key k knit p finishing purl k2tog you will end with 12 live knit 2 stitches together stitches cut yarn leaving ssk a 10 tail and draw slip slip knit slipped st together through remaining stitches p2tog purl 2 stitches together pull tight and secure end 2/1 lpc weave in ends and block sl 2 to cn hold to front p1 k2 from cn over a dinner plate 2/1 rpc sl 1 to cn hold to back k2 p1 from cn 2/2 lpc sl 2 to cn hold to front p2 k2 from cn 2/2 rpc sl 2 to cn hold to back k2 p2 from cn c2b sl 1 to cn hold to back k1 k1 from cn c2f sl 1 to cn hold to front k1 k1 from cn c4b sl 2 to cn hold to back k2 k2 from cn c4f sl 2 to cn hold to front k2 k2 from cn cdd slip 2 stitches knitwise as one k1 pass 2 slipped st over as one no stitch no stitch yo yarn over c2lp sl 1 to cn hold to front p1 k1 from cn c2rp sl 1 to cn hold to back k1 p1 from cn 2/2/2 rkc sl 4 to cn hold to back k2 sl last 2 st from cn back to left needle bring cn to front k2 k2 from cn pfbf n/a p into the front back then front of st m1p n/a with left needle lift the bar between stitches from back to front and purl into it n/a m1 with left needle lift the bar between stitches from front to back and knit into the back loop © jessica correa 2011 for personal use only chart notes follow every round from right to left repeats are between the red lines on rounds 25 and 60 reposition the marker to the red right-side border to mark a new beginning of round on the last repeat of round 31 move the marker to the blue line for a new beginning of round you won t work the last two stitches © jessica correa 2011 for personal use only
